query.name: SELECT_ALL_UNSYNC_RES
query.default: SELECT CMSOFF.STRUCTURE_ID, CMSOFF.PARENT_ID, CMSOFF.RESOURCE_ID, CMSOFF.RESOURCE_PATH, CMSON.STRUCTURE_ID, CMSON.PARENT_ID, CMSON.RESOURCE_ID, CMSON.RESOURCE_PATH FROM CMS_OFFLINE_STRUCTURE CMSOFF, CMS_ONLINE_STRUCTURE CMSON WHERE CMSON.RESOURCE_PATH = CMSOFF.RESOURCE_PATH AND ( NOT CMSOFF.RESOURCE_ID = CMSON.RESOURCE_ID OR NOT CMSOFF.STRUCTURE_ID = CMSON.STRUCTURE_ID )

query.name: UPDATE_ONLINE_STRUCTURE_IDS
query.default: UPDATE CMS_ONLINE_STRUCTURE SET STRUCTURE_ID = ?, PARENT_ID = ?, RESOURCE_ID = ? WHERE STRUCTURE_ID = ?

query.name: UPDATE_ONLINE_PARENT_IDS
query.default: UPDATE CMS_ONLINE_STRUCTURE SET PARENT_ID = ?, WHERE PARENT_ID = ?

query.name: UPDATE_ONLINE_PROPERTY_IDS
query.default: UPDATE CMS_ONLINE_PROPERTIES SET PROPERTY_MAPPING_ID = ? WHERE PROPERTY_MAPPING_ID = ?

query.name: UPDATE_ONLINE_RESOURCE_IDS
query.default: UPDATE CMS_ONLINE_RESOURCES SET RESOURCE_ID = ? WHERE RESOURCE_ID = ?

query.name: UPDATE_ONLINE_ACE_IDS
query.default: UPDATE CMS_ONLINE_ACCESSCONTROL SET RESOURCE_ID = ? WHERE RESOURCE_ID = ?

query.name: UPDATE_ONLINE_CONTENT_IDS
query.default: UPDATE CMS_CONTENTS SET RESOURCE_ID = ? WHERE RESOURCE_ID = ?
